name: Pigdom
description:
Controls

Move - WASD / Arrow keys
Jump - W / Up Arrow
Change Control - Space
Attack - Q

You are the king of the Pigdom! Lead your minions through puzzles

This game was originally made in 72 hours for Mini-Jam 75 Theme: Wisdom
Programming, Design, and Sound Effects by Michael Williams - Bouncing Turtle
Level design assistance by Elliot Khalife
Art by Pixel Frog - https://pixelfrog-assets.itch.io/kings-and-pigs
